interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Travel Bottles for Toiletries, Silicone Travel Size Bottles And Squeezable Containers Holders with belt clip Keychain for Backpack, Shampoo, Liquid, Cosmetic Products(2 oz, 6 Pack) Review Date: 2020/11/17 Store: MACRAY Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MACRAY', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 6.61 x 1.61 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '782938308006'} Review Text: I am very happy when I got this one coz it looks super nice and made of quality material. I got this mostly to hold hand sanitizers for my whole family so we have our own when we are out.

PROS:
* perfect size! If you will travel for a week, this will be enough to hold your stuff.
* the silicone material is very nice, I am very impressed!
* wide mouth
* easy to refill and get your stuff out
* the carabiners are made of high quality metal.
* easy to squeeze (but be careful if it’s a hand sanitizer or water like liquid it will come out very fast so squeeze with caution)

CONS
* The scent of whatever you put leaks out. You will need a a few ziplock bags to contain the scent if you are traveling or else it will be all over your luggage. If you happen to mix it with food items, expect it to taste whatever you put on this bottles.
* don’t use for hand sanitizers or anything with alcohol base on it. I got it mainly for holding hand sanitizers for my whole family but the scent leaks so bad that I have to not use it for the purpose. It is also not good when squeezing coz it will not give you little amount.
* some liquid leaks too.

This product will be good for lotion, toothpaste or shampoo/conditioner coz they have thicker consistency. But be aware that scents leaks. The reason why I gave it 3 stars is because I can’t use it for the purpose I got it for (hand sanitizers)
If you plan to use it thicker liquids and don’t mind the scent leaks then this is perfect coz the silicone material is very nice. Review Title: BEWARE! Scent Leaks! Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Travel Enthusiast**: The user is likely to travel frequently, evident from their purchase of travel-sized containers designed for toiletries.
  
- **Preference for Quality and Functionality**: They value quality materials, as highlighted by their admiration for silicone and the overall design of the product, indicating a preference for durable, well-made items.

- **Family-Oriented Approach**: The user’s intent to provide hand sanitizers for their family suggests a focus on family convenience and wellness during outings.

- **Practical User**: They appreciate practicality, noting the ease of refilling, wide mouth for use, and overall functionality. However, they're critical about performance issues like leakage, showing a desire for reliable products that meet their needs.

- **Sensitivity to Scent**: The concern about scent leakage indicates a preference for products that contain and manage scents well, as well as a potential caution regarding the types of liquids used in containers.

- **Cautious and Informed Reviewer**: The detailed pros and cons list in the review reflects a methodical approach in evaluating products, demonstrating they seek thorough information before making decisions. 

Overall, this user profile conveys a practical, quality-conscious individual who values effective solutions for travel with family while being sensitive to product performance.
